title: Halp!!! i can barely log into league and everything is so slowwwww
body: i cant play any game whatsoever and i cant load the store either and i keep getting unknown error like 100 times. it was working perfectly fine yesterday. i can barely log in as it is and i start it through as administrator so what do i do??? HELP{{summoner:3}}

replies.body:
The *unknown error* that pops up in the client often occurs as a result of a *poor connection* to League's servers. I'd recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so we can confirm your local network settings are peachy.

Let me know if this caused any change.
